testimonials.text: During this course, Zixiao Sun demonstrated professionalism, courtesy, maturity, respect for authority and a desire to become competent in the material being taught.  His excellent understanding of the java course allowed him to successfully pass the course with a high average.  Zixiao Sun was always on time for class and handed in all assignments on time.  I have no hesitation in recommending Zixiao Sun for a position with your company.
